meanings.definition: The quality or state of being physically strong.
meanings.sent1: His strengths helped him lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: She admired the athlete's physical strengths.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's strengths made him unbeatable in arm wrestling.
meanings.sent4: Her strengths were like pillars holding up a building.
meanings.sent5: The lion's strengths were evident in its powerful roar.

meanings.definition: The capacity of an object or substance to withstand great force or pressure.
meanings.sent1: The bridge's strengths were tested during the storm.
meanings.sent2: Engineers carefully consider the strengths of materials when designing buildings.
meanings.sent3: The balloon's strengths were put to the test in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: The strengths of the metal were evident in its ability to resist bending.
meanings.sent5: The tree's strengths were evident in its ability to withstand the storm.

meanings.definition: A good or beneficial quality or attribute of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: One of her strengths is her ability to listen attentively.
meanings.sent2: The strengths of the team lie in their diverse skills.
meanings.sent3: His strengths in cooking made him the star of the family barbecue.
meanings.sent4: The strengths of the book were its engaging plot and relatable characters.
meanings.sent5: The strengths of the medicine were evident in its quick pain relief.
